title: Learning to Develop Divine Consciousness | Sri Jai Chaitanya Dasa | ISKCON Bangalore
speaker: HG Jai Chaitanya Dasa

segments.text: Unless we get divine consciousness, we cannot cross over the tribunals.
We cannot cross over the dualities.
Profit will affect us.
Name and fame will affect us.
Loss will disturb us.
Facilities not provided will disturb us.
Too much facilities will make us proud.
Both these things are affecting.
Dualities are there.
Unless you are in divine consciousness, it is not possible.
A man engaged in devotional service rids himself of both good and bad actions.
That is where the Supreme Lord is saying that your only work in this material world is to do your duty.
Without looking for the results.
Whether it is profit or loss, success or failure.
And when you act in such a way where we are not looking for the result,
you will slowly, slowly get, be fixed in consciousness.
So the body is you doing all sinful activities.
Your mind will also be sinful.
Other way round also.
If the mind is always sinful, the body will also follow the mind.
When there is acceptance.
When the external body is acting.
Something is happening inside also.
The ability to cross beyond dualities is happening inside.
That is why we say external actions are important to change the insides.
Many times we see psychologically, insides if you change, outside you can change.
But in spiritual life, easy to change outside, then inside automatically follows outside.
